ee bahutharaya owun hondin danna aththanya.meyin ekeku miyusik widiyo nirmanaye kela pamini yanya.ese nam jothipala handa sinama thira handak pamanak da? 1908 wasare di mul warata gayuna danno budun ge githaye mul gayakaya kawurundayi eka elle wimasu kala ekawara pilithura diya hakke katada eya hiyubat rajapaksha nam gayakaya wisin gayana laddeyayi sihipath karana kisiwaku natha.eheth me githaya thawamath apa wisin wenath gayakayange handin rasa windinu labannemu.eya gayu mul gayakaya kawurundayi wimasumak natha.eheth wisi pas wasarak gewana kala jothipalayange handa shrawanaya kala tharunayan ema handin thawamath wasanga wa aththeya.me bahutharayata jothipalayan rasa windinnata labenuye ekala men sangithaya paraya nagena jothipala handa nowe.bahutharaya aththe nawa ilektronika sangithaya magin palanayen thorawa jothi ge handa musu kala awasthawan ya.eyin jothipalayan ge prathapawath handa nomara maranu labanneya.agni diga aasiyanu kalapaye chithrapata madhyayaye di githaya yanu rupaya abhinaya menma wadagath prakashana madhayayaki.shrungaraya da wirahawa da aadi minis hangim wada hodin prekshakayata grahanaya kirime la githaya wada pahasu ha janapriya deyakayi sinamakaruwange mathayayi.chithrapatayaka githa sankhyawa wadiwima ekala nam mahath aanandayata hethu wiya.
